title: Gullane
name: Falko Konditormeister
directions: At the cross-roads in the centre of the village
content: After a bracing walk on the beach, what better than a hot cup of tea or coffee and a slice of proper Black Forest Gateau? Get that and much more at this German-style bakery, run by the eponymous Falko himself. If you need an "alibi" for tucking into the cakes, there are some delicious savouries on offer as well.
